faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.answer1: You're charged on the same day each month. Credits are added to your account immediately after successful payment.
faq.answer2: You'll keep access to your subscription benefits until the end of your current billing period. No refunds for partial months.
faq.answer3: Yes! Unused subscription credits accumulate in your account and don't expire as long as your subscription is active.
faq.answer4: Yes, you can upgrade or downgrade at any time. Changes take effect at the start of your next billing cycle.
